title: Season rewards question
body: I am positive I finished the season in gold 4, for some reason I have a silver border and no skin...

replies.body: I'm not sure that the silver border you're seeing is from this season, it may very well still be the one from last year. Not *all* of the season rewards have been delivered quite yet. If you still don't see your gold border in a few days, be sure to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vybmR4kl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-14T00:00:29.232+0000)
>
> I'm not sure that the silver border you're seeing is from this season, it may very well still be the one from last year. Not *all* of the season rewards have been delivered quite yet. If you still don't see your gold border in a few days, be sure to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

Thanks for getting back to me! I was silver last season so that would make sense, I got my icon that is why I was worried. Thanks!

They are still giving out rewards in small chunks.

Today most of NA received their Icon but nothing else. Any borders you see or profile flares are from your rank in Season 6!

The process is going to take a while.
